snippet: Malaysian forces also led a ground assault on an armed group that has occupied parts of northern Borneo Island for weeks.
abstract: Malaysian fighter jets and ground-attack aircraft bomb estimated 200 Filipino gunmen holed up near village in northeast as Malaysia tries to end month-long incursion meant to reclaim part of Borneo for defunct sultanate.
lead_paragraph: Malaysian forces also led a ground assault on an armed group that has occupied parts of northern Borneo Island for weeks.

headline.seo: Malaysia Attacks Armed Filipino Rebels With Airstrikes and Mortars
headline.main: Malaysia Attacks Filipino Rebels With Jets and Mortars
headline.print_headline: Malaysia: Government Forces Strafe Filipino Gunmen
